entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How may I assist you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return this VeloBand Pulse thing I bought. It's not working out for me.
Certainly, I can help you with a return. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your purchase?
It's under [customer's email address]. And hurry up, I don't have all day.
Thank you. I've located your order. I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on [date of purchase, 15 days prior to call date]. What's the reason for wanting to return the smart watch?
It's just not what I expected. The heart rate monitor is inaccurate and the battery life is terrible. I want my money back.

I understand your frustration. At VeloFit, we want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. Our standard return policy is 90 days for a full refund. So, returning your VeloBand Pulse won't be a problem.
Ninety days? Really? I thought I only had like, 10 days or something. I almost didn't bother calling.

Yes, you're well within the timeframe. The 90 days return policy covers most of our products. Let's go ahead and process that return for you. I’ll email you a prepaid shipping label. Just pack up your VeloBand Pulse, attach the label, and drop it off at your nearest carrier location. Once we receive the item, we'll issue a full refund to your original payment method. This process usually takes 7-10 business days.
Okay, that sounds great. So I don't need to talk to a manager or anything like that?
No, not at all. I can handle everything for you right now. No need to involve a manager. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thank you so much for your help! I really appreciate it.
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business with VeloFit. Have a great day!
